overview:
Antonio is a lawyer and a technology entrepreneur.

He is the founder of Overboost, a tech boutique accelerator built by experimented telecom and Internet entrepreneurs with a razor-sharp focus in digital industry in Latin America. Currently, Antonio is Advisor Partner in companies such as Kidbox.net, Ikensolutions.com, Virali.ca, Bukeala.com and Doubledoods.com

Previously, Antonio was the Co-founder of Novacash, a non banking debit card company, in Argentina. Novacash was the first non banking debit card system in Latin America for buying on internet, mobile phones and money send system. Antonio and his partner roll out the company through Latin America, developing offices in Brazil, Chile, and Argentina, backed up by Venture Capital partners from Argentina and United States. In December 2000, the company signed a sale option with Western Union International, a First Data company. He has also co-founded companies such as Mobile2biz, the leading mobile solutions provider in Latam. In 2006 it merged with Netpeople International the biggest mobile provider in the region (nowadays a Zed´s company). And MundoMovil, a innovative electronic platform of prepaid products for retail chains which after a successful rollout in Argentina was sold to Cargaya.

Antonio, is also Co-founder and president of Mobile Monday Buenos Aires, a global community of mobile industry visionaries, developers and influentials with presence in over 150 cities Worldwide
